[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1718288987960{background: #fdeff5 url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/truelysell.jpg?id=1772) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1773″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Transform Your Online Platform with Truelysell

Versatile software solution designed to streamline the management of online platforms.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Try the Demo” style=”custom” custom_background=”#fd2692″ custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ftruelysell-laravel.dreamstechnologies.com%2Fadmin|title:Truelysell|target:_blank” el_class=”me-3″][vc_btn title=”Visit Product Site” style=”custom” custom_background=”#fd2692″ custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ftruelysell.com%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:_blank”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1718075631946{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTVCZmxleHlfYnJlYWRjcnVtYiU1RA==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″ el_class=”reverse-col ticklist”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1775″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

About TruelySell

TruelySell offers intuitive vendor management tools, allowing businesses to efficiently onboard and manage vendors, ensuring smooth collaboration and communication.

  • Intuitive Vendor and Product Management: Truelysell offers user-friendly tools for efficient vendor onboarding and comprehensive product management, streamlining the organization and presentation of your online catalog.
  • Secure Payment Gateway Integration: The platform integrates with secure payment gateways, ensuring safe and reliable transaction processing, protecting sensitive financial data, and reducing fraud risks.
  • Customizable Themes and Branding: Truelysell provides customizable themes and branding options, enabling businesses to create a unique and personalized online presence that reflects their brand identity and enhances customer engagement.

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Visit Product Site” style=”custom” custom_background=”#fd2692″ custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ftruelysell.com%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1716628480831{background-color: #f5f7fa !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Features

Boost Your Business with Truelysell’s Powerful Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Customize it Now” style=”custom” custom_background=”#fd2692″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdreamstechnologies.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Real-Time Analytics and Reporting

Access comprehensive insights into your sales performance, customer behavior, and overall business health with our real-time analytics and reporting tools. These empower data-driven decision-making, enabling you to adapt strategies swiftly and capitalize on emerging opportunities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Automated Invoicing and Billing

Simplify your financial operations with automated invoicing and billing systems. By reducing manual effort and ensuring accuracy in transaction records, our platform streamlines your processes, allowing you to focus on growing your business[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Integration

Integrate seamlessly with CRM systems to synchronize customer data across platforms. This enhances communication and enables personalized customer service, fostering stronger relationships and boosting customer loyalty[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Multi-Channel Selling

Effortlessly manage and sell products across various online channels from one centralized platform. This approach expands your reach and increases sales opportunities without introducing unnecessary complexity, providing a seamless shopping experience for your customers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Scalable Infrastructure

Truelysell’s platform is engineered to evolve alongside your business. It accommodates increased traffic, transactions, and product listings without sacrificing performance, ensuring a smooth and reliable experience for both you and your customers as your business grows[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Robust Security Measures

Rest assured knowing that your data and transactions are safeguarded by advanced security protocols. With features such as data encryption and regular security updates, we prioritize the protection of your sensitive information, providing peace of mind for you and your customers alike[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”dft-spacer”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDc3BhbiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUzQyUyRmgyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_basic_grid post_type=”casestudies” max_items=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1742186670972-78f5da76-979b-3″ el_class=”rec-blg-posts all-case-studies”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”greybg”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Technologies Used

We harness a diverse array of advanced technologies to craft innovative solutions that drive digital transformation and shape the future.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”tophdr” css=”.vc_custom_1716628305519{background: #191f49 url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/bottom-ctn-1.jpg?id=1712) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Master Your Marketplace with Truelysell’s Expertise

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Reach Out!” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ffffff” custom_text=”#0b124a” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdreamstechnologies.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
